response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance for us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is worth $1,000,000 to you. We are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000, hoping to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We believe in fostering long-term relationships and are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
